abstract: San Francisco Giants re-sign Gold Glove-winning shortstop Brandon Crawford to six-year, $75 million contract; other pro baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Fresh off his Gold Glove last week, San Francisco shortstop Brandon Crawford signed a six-year, $75 million contract that will take him through the 2021 season.

headline.main: Giants Sign Brandon Crawford for Six Years
headline.print_headline: Giants Sign Crawford for Six Years

snippet: Fresh off his Gold Glove last week, San Francisco shortstop Brandon Crawford signed a six-year, $75 million contract that will take him through the 2021 season.
